Setting Up a DMZ Host

Use the Setup > The DMZ (Demilitarized Zone) Host feature allows one host in the LAN to be exposed to the Internet to use services such as Internet gaming and video conferencing. Access to the DMZ Host from the Internet can be further restricted by using firewall access rules.

Enter the IP address of the network device that you want to use as a DMZ host. Alternatively, enter zero (0.0.0.0) to disable the DMZ Host. By default, this feature is disabled.

NOTE     Before navigating away from this page, click Save to save your settings, or click Cancel to undo them. Any unsaved changes are abandoned.
